name: Green Chili Whipped Sweet Potatoes
keywords: fall, jalapeño, sweet potato, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 4 pounds sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
4 jalapeno peppers, seeded and finely minced
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potato cubes in a large, heavy saucepan, cover with water, bring to a boil and cook until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain.
Dry the saucepan, and melt the butter in it. Add the jalapenos, and saute for a minute or so, until they soften.
Force the drained potatoes through a ricer or a coarse sieve into the saucepan. Stir; then, fold in the maple syrup. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
